Suppose we have the following toy data set, named `df`, on the categorical variable `cat1` and the quantitative variable `x`. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df <- tibble(cat = c("A", "B", "C"),
  x = c(2, -1, 14))
library(pander)
pander(df)
```
